last_episode_to_air.name: Dream Knights
last_episode_to_air.overview: In Hyung must say farewell to her knights after the dance competition ends.

name: Dream Knight
overview: Though she's constantly bullied, orphaned high schooler Joo In Hyeong (Song Ha Yoon) refuses to let life get her down and fills her little home with positive vibes from her favorite boy band. But fandom hits the next level when she discovers the ability to call upon four mysterious hotties (played by GOT7), who turn her world topsy-turvy with magical and hilarious antics, including JYP artist cameos. No matter how tough life gets, she'll get by with a little help from her friends, especially with dreamy knights!

episodes.name: There's Something Special About Them
episodes.overview: High schooler Joo In Hyung finds herself homeless after her mom passes away. At school, everyone goes wild when the hot new boy band GOT shows up.

episodes.name: Unfriendly Guys
episodes.overview: In Hyung continues to get picked on, but the mysterious group of boys crashing at her house come to her defense.

episodes.name: Why Did You Come To My House?
episodes.overview: The boys finally reveal to In Hyung why they won't leave her makeshift home. Later, they show off their magical abilities.

episodes.name: Please Take Care of In Hyung
episodes.overview: Angry with the magical boys, In Hyung reluctantly welcomes them back when they help her with her broken leg.

episodes.name: Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo
episodes.overview: With a broken leg and a bad reputation, no one wants to be In Hyung's dance partner for the big contest.

episodes.name: With Stars
episodes.overview: GOT is filming a documentary about their lives as students when they run into In Hyung, whose crew challenges GOT to a dance battle.

episodes.name: Secretly, Persistently
episodes.overview: Skeptical of In Hyung's friends, GOT schemes to reveal their rival's supernatural abilities.

episodes.name: Why Did the Little Mermaid Turn Into Bubbles?
episodes.overview: After GOT's shocking revelation, In Hyung's guardians must decide whether or not to stay by her side.

episodes.name: In Hyung's Guardians
episodes.overview: The origin of In Hyung's protectors come to light in a game changing flashback.

episodes.name: The Road to You
episodes.overview: In Hyung finds herself with a boyfriend all of a sudden, but everything may not be as it seems.

episodes.name: One Sweet Day
episodes.overview: In Hyung and JB spend a perfect day together the day before the competition.

episodes.name: Dream Knights
episodes.overview: In Hyung must say farewell to her knights after the dance competition ends.
